CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT( clofor_com_cfs__Container__c ) = null , null, (TEXT( clofor_com_cfs__ContainerNumber__c ) + "x" + TEXT( clofor_com_cfs__Container__c )))
+ IF(TEXT( clofor_com_cfs__Container2__c ) = null , null, (" & "+ TEXT( clofor_com_cfs__ContainerNumber2__c ) + "x" + TEXT( clofor_com_cfs__Container2__c )))
+ IF(TEXT( clofor_com_cfs__Container3__c ) = null , null, (" & "+ TEXT( clofor_com_cfs__ContainerNumber3__c ) + "x" + TEXT( clofor_com_cfs__Container3__c )))
CustomField.label: Container Type All
